Text: Control Panel - Backup And Restore - Create A System Repair Disc (On The Upper-Left Corner Of The Screen)
You know, if your computer is already fucked up, you really don't need to know how you could have made a disk beforehand to save it.
Thank You so much for this. It saved my PC. I finally opened a cmd using this.

You just saved my old Compaq computer.  I tried to install windows 98 se alongside windows 7 and it must have tried to overwrite windows 7 because it said operating system missing!! thank you very much
